newsitem.title: HONG KONG: Hongkong Ferry up on redevelopment plan.
newsitem.headline: Hongkong Ferry up on redevelopment plan.

text.p: Shares of ferry operator Hongkong Ferry (Holdings) Ltd surged on renewed speculation of strong earnings from the redevelopment of its old shipyard site into a comprehensive complex, brokers said on Monday.
The stock jumped HK$1.85, or 15.41 percent, to HK$13.80 in afternoon trade on volume of 4.78 million shares.
"Hopes that the company may distribute a higher dividend and even a special dividend in view of the development fuelled fund buying," said a sales manager at a regional brokerage.
"A possible increase in net asset value also aided demand, especially since it is still a laggard," said one analyst.
